Class RedirectRenderPageAction

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action

    public class RedirectRenderPageAction
extends RenderPage
    A sample on how one could implement redirection based on for device detection. This sample probably does not work, use it as a prototype.
    Author:
    Dolf
